body:
Hello @qwhelan! Thanks for updating the PR.





 - In the file [`asv_bench/benchmarks/join_merge.py`](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/ce6bed2bbc57351d1d08cfd8a3962426f74ec6a8/asv_bench/benchmarks/join_merge.py), following are the PEP8 issues :

> [Line 284:80](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/ce6bed2bbc57351d1d08cfd8a3962426f74ec6a8/asv_bench/benchmarks/join_merge.py#L284): [E501](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E501) line too long (90 > 79 characters)
> [Line 332:80](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/ce6bed2bbc57351d1d08cfd8a3962426f74ec6a8/asv_bench/benchmarks/join_merge.py#L332): [E501](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E501) line too long (83 > 79 characters)

















##### Comment last updated on January 08, 2019 at 21:23 Hours UTC

can you merge master and update
@jreback I've added a small `asv` suite fix - a recent change to `pandas_vb_common.py` means the suite will completely fail on init for any commits prior to ~July when the EA Dtypes were added.
